commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
{
  "header": {
    "home": "HOME",
    "introduce": "INTRODUCE",
    "topic": "TOPIC",
    "service": "SERVICE",
    "community": "COMMUNITY",
    "contact": "CONTACT",
    "company": "Company",
    "employee": "Employee",
    "whereMoney": "Where money",
    "retire55": "Retire 55",
    "lifetimeMoney": "Lifetime money",
    "facebook": "Facebook",
    "youtube": "Youtube",
    "language": {
      "vietnamese": "Vietnamese",
      "english": "English"
    }
  },
  "home": {
    "hero": {
      "title1": "WE HELP PEOPLE SAVE",
      "title2": "AND",
      "title3": "BUSINESSES GROW",
      "title4": "FINANCIAL CONFIDENCE.",
      "subtitle": "Personalized Financial Planning, Backed By Certified Advisors.",
      "startFree": "Start Free",
      "bookSession": "Book Session"
    },
    "aboutUs": {
      "title": "Why We Exist",
      "monthlyMembers": "Monthly Members",
      "reviews": "reviews",
      "intro": "Welcome to",
      "company": "MoneyWise",
      "description": ". We exist to empower Vietnamese people to take control of their financial lives‚Äîby building smart habits, gaining confidence, and adopting a modern money mindset. We believe financial literacy is the foundation for confidence, stability, and long-term wellbeing. That's why we focus on:",
      "point1": "üìà Boosting financial literacy through practical, personalized coaching",
      "point2": "üß≠ Building trust-driven systems for confident money decisions",
      "point3": "üí° Localizing global strategies for Vietnam's personal finance needs",
      "point4": "üå± Empowering individuals and families toward lasting financial wellness",
      "explore": "EXPLORE"
    },
    "whatWeDo": {
      "title": "What We Do",
      "subtitle": "We help individual and enterprise clients answer three critical questions that shape their financial future.",
      "service1": {
        "title": "Where's the Money?",
        "desc": "Discover hidden cash flow, optimize spending, and unlock financial potential."
      },
      "service2": {
        "title": "Retire at 55",
        "desc": "Build a realistic, personalized roadmap to early retirement"
      },
      "service3": {
        "title": "Lifetime Income",
        "desc": "Create sustainable income streams for a secure financial future."
      }
    },
    "featuredNews": {
      "title": "Featured News",
      "subtitle": "Pallamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur.",
      "news1": {
        "title": "Can I Really Retire at 55 in Vietnam?",
        "category": "Financial",
        "desc": "Retiring at 55 in Vietnam is an achievable goal, but it depends on reaching a specific financial number, not just an age. It requires disciplined planning to accumulate a nest egg worth about 25 times your annual living expenses."
      },
      "news2": {
        "title": "3 Common Money Mistakes",
        "category": "Business",
        "desc": "Avoid these common pitfalls to secure your financial future."
      },
      "news3": {
        "title": "Why Financial Literacy is Key for Your Employees?",
        "category": "Investment",
        "desc": "An employee's financial stress directly impacts their focus and productivity at work. This article argues that providing financial education is a strategic investment for companies."
      },
      "news4": {
        "title": "A Beginner's Guide to Building Wealth",
        "category": "Market",
        "desc": "Building wealth is a journey that requires knowledge, discipline, and a solid plan. This guide covers the essential steps to start your wealth-building journey."
      },
      "readMore": "Read More ¬ª"
    },
    "testimonials": {
      "title": "What Sets Us Apart",
      "subtitle": "Feedback from clients who have used our services",
      "testimonial1": {
        "content": "MoneyWise helped my family rethink how we manage money every day. Their goal-setting tips made saving for the future feel achievable.",
        "name": "John Smith",
        "title": "CEO of ABC Company"
      },
      "testimonial2": {
        "content": "Partnering with MoneyWise Vietnam transformed how our employees think about money. The workshops were engaging and practical.",
        "name": "Jane Doe",
        "title": "Director of XYZ Company"
      },
      "testimonial3": {
        "content": "I've recommended it to many friends and colleagues‚Äîonce you see the impact, you want others to benefit too.",
        "name": "Robert Johnson",
        "title": "CTO of DEF Company"
      }
    },
    "bannerBottom": {
      "title": "Let's Work Together",
      "subtitle": "Start your financial independence journey today",
      "placeholder": "Enter your email",
      "button": "Get Started"
    },
    "contactUs": {
      "title": "Contact Us",
      "subtitle": "Leave your information, and we will get back to you as soon as possible"
    }
  },
  "contact": {
    "title": "Contact Us",
    "contactInfo": "Contact Information",
    "address": "123 To Hien Thanh Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City",
    "phone": "0123 1234 5678",
    "email": "info@moneywise.vn",
    "sendMessage": "Send us a message",
    "form": {
      "fullName": "Full Name *",
      "email": "Email *",
      "phone": "Phone Number",
      "subject": "Subject",
      "message": "Message *",
      "submit": "Send Message ‚Üí",
      "name": "Full name",
      "content": "Content",
      "newsletter": "I want to receive the newsletter",
      "send": "Send"
    },
    "importantNote": "Important Note:",
    "noteText": "Please only send requests related to work, spam content will be deleted without notice.",
    "leaveInfo": "Leave your consultation information",
    "addressAlt": "3 Nguyen Co Thach, An Khanh, HCM City"
  },
  "introduce": {
    "page": {
      "overview": "This is an overview page about our company and our team.",
      "aboutCompany": "About the Company",
      "aboutTeam": "About the Team"
    },
    "company": {
      "title": "MONEYWISE FINANCIAL CONSULTING COMPANY",
      "intro1": "MoneyWise Financial Consulting Company was established in 2018 with the dedication of a team of experts with more than",
      "intro2": "40 years of experience",
      "intro3": "in the fields of finance, banking, investment and corporate governance.",
      "intro4": "MoneyWise is proud to have a team of excellent, experienced, dynamic and dedicated experts in analyzing, planning, and providing optimal financial solutions for individual and corporate clients.",
      "location1": "With the advantage of having 2 offices in",
      "location2": "Hanoi",
      "location3": "and",
      "location4": "Ho Chi Minh City",
      "location5": ", MoneyWise brings convenience in meeting, exchanging and consulting directly.",
      "consultingTitle": "CONSULTING AREAS AT MONEYWISE",
      "consulting1": "Personal & corporate investment consulting:",
      "consulting1Desc": "market analysis, investment opportunities, risk management.",
      "consulting2": "Corporate financial management consulting:",
      "consulting2Desc": "capital structure, cash flow, business expansion plan.",
      "consulting3": "Loan & credit consulting:",
      "consulting3Desc": "solutions to access capital, optimize borrowing costs.",
      "consulting4": "Insurance & retirement consulting:",
      "consulting4Desc": "asset protection plan, long-term safety assurance.",
      "consulting5": "Personal asset management consulting:",
      "consulting5Desc": "saving, investing and accumulating for the future.",
      "consulting6": "Tax & financial legal consulting:",
      "consulting6Desc": "regulatory compliance, legal cost optimization.",
      "coreValuesTitle": "CORE VALUES OF MONEYWISE",
      "coreValuesIntro": "Throughout its years of operation, MoneyWise has always taken the motto",
      "coreValuesMotto": "\"HEART - VISION - TALENT - TRUST\"",
      "coreValuesGuide": "as a guideline:",
      "value1": "HEART:",
      "value1Desc": "Responsibility, dedication, putting customer benefits first.",
      "value2": "VISION:",
      "value2Desc": "Aiming to become a multi-service financial consulting company.",
      "value3": "TALENT:",
      "value3Desc": "A team of experts with extensive knowledge & experience.",
      "value4": "TRUST:",
      "value4Desc": "Building prestige, becoming a reliable partner of customers."
    }
  },
  "community": {
    "title": "Welcome to the Community Page"
  },
  "footer": {
    "tagline": "We're here to help you grow with confidence",
    "servicesTitle": "Services",
    "service1": "Personal Finance Coaching",
    "service2": "Wealth Strategy",
    "service3": "Financial Literacy",
    "service4": "Retirement Planning",
    "service5": "SME Consulting",
    "contactTitle": "Contact",
    "address": "3 Nguyen Co Thach, An Khanh, HCM City",
    "phone": "(+84) 909 163 821",
    "email": "contact@moneywise.vn",
    "copyright": "¬© 2025 MoneyWise. All rights reserved.",
    "privacy": "Privacy Policy",
    "terms": "Terms of Use"
  }
}

  },
  "home": {
    "hero": {
      "title1": "WE HELP PEOPLE SAVE",
      "title2": "AND",
      "title3": "BUSINESSES GROW",
      "title4": "FINANCIAL CONFIDENCE.",
      "subtitle": "Personalized Financial Planning, Backed By Certified Advisors.",
      "startFree": "Start Free",
      "bookSession": "Book Session"
    },
    "aboutUs": {
      "title": "Why We Exist",
      "monthlyMembers": "Monthly Members",
      "reviews": "reviews",
      "intro": "Welcome to",
      "company": "MoneyWise",
      "description": ". We exist to empower Vietnamese people to take control of their financial lives‚Äîby building smart habits, gaining confidence, and adopting a modern money mindset. We believe financial literacy is the foundation for confidence, stability, and long-term wellbeing. That's why we focus on:",
      "point1": "üìà Boosting financial literacy through practical, personalized coaching",
      "point2": "üß≠ Building trust-driven systems for confident money decisions",
      "point3": "üí° Localizing global strategies for Vietnam's personal finance needs",
      "point4": "üå± Empowering individuals and families toward lasting financial wellness",
      "explore": "EXPLORE"
    },
    "whatWeDo": {
      "title": "What We Do",
      "subtitle": "We help individual and enterprise clients answer three critical questions that shape their financial future.",
      "service1": {
        "title": "Where's the Money?",
        "desc": "Discover hidden cash flow, optimize spending, and unlock financial potential."
      },
      "service2": {
        "title": "Retire at 55",
        "desc": "Build a realistic, personalized roadmap to early retirement"
      },
      "service3": {
        "title": "Lifetime Income",
        "desc": "Create sustainable income streams for a secure financial future."
      }
    },
    "featuredNews": {
      "title": "Featured News",
      "subtitle": "Pallamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur.",
      "news1": {
        "title": "Can I Really Retire at 55 in Vietnam?",
        "category": "Financial",
        "desc": "Retiring at 55 in Vietnam is an achievable goal, but it depends on reaching a specific financial number, not just an age. It requires disciplined planning to accumulate a nest egg worth about 25 times your annual living expenses."
      },
      "news2": {
        "title": "3 Common Money Mistakes",
        "category": "Business",
        "desc": "Avoid these common pitfalls to secure your financial future."
      },
      "news3": {
        "title": "Why Financial Literacy is Key for Your Employees?",
        "category": "Investment",
        "desc": "An employee's financial stress directly impacts their focus and productivity at work. This article argues that providing financial education is a strategic investment for companies."
      },
      "news4": {
        "title": "A Beginner's Guide to Building Wealth",
        "category": "Market",
        "desc": "Building wealth is a journey that requires knowledge, discipline, and a solid plan. This guide covers the essential steps to start your wealth-building journey."
      },
      "readMore": "Read More ¬ª"
    },
    "testimonials": {
      "title": "What Sets Us Apart",
      "subtitle": "Feedback from clients who have used our services",
      "testimonial1": {
        "content": "MoneyWise helped my family rethink how we manage money every day. Their goal-setting tips made saving for the future feel achievable.",
        "name": "John Smith",
        "title": "CEO of ABC Company"
      },
      "testimonial2": {
        "content": "Partnering with MoneyWise Vietnam transformed how our employees think about money. The workshops were engaging and practical.",
        "name": "Jane Doe",
        "title": "Director of XYZ Company"
      },
      "testimonial3": {
        "content": "I've recommended it to many friends and colleagues‚Äîonce you see the impact, you want others to benefit too.",
        "name": "Robert Johnson",
        "title": "CTO of DEF Company"
      }
    },
    "bannerBottom": {
      "title": "Let's Work Together",
      "subtitle": "Start your financial independence journey today",
      "placeholder": "Enter your email",
      "button": "Get Started"
    },
    "contactUs": {
      "title": "Contact Us",
      "subtitle": "Leave your information, and we will get back to you as soon as possible"
    }
  },
  "contact": {
    "title": "Contact Us",
    "contactInfo": "Contact Information",

    "phone": "0123 1234 5678",

    },

    "leaveInfo": "Leave your consultation information",
    "addressAlt": "3 Nguyen Co Thach, An Khanh, HCM City"
  },
  "introduce": {
    "page": {
      "overview": "This is an overview page about our company and our team.",
      "aboutCompany": "About the Company",
      "aboutTeam": "About the Team"
    },
    "company": {
      "title": "MONEYWISE FINANCIAL CONSULTING COMPANY",
      "intro1": "MoneyWise Financial Consulting Company was established in 2018 with the dedication of a team of experts with more than",
      "intro2": "40 years of experience",
      "intro3": "in the fields of finance, banking, investment and corporate governance.",
      "intro4": "MoneyWise is proud to have a team of excellent, experienced, dynamic and dedicated experts in analyzing, planning, and providing optimal financial solutions for individual and corporate clients.",
      "location1": "With the advantage of having 2 offices in",
      "location2": "Hanoi",
      "location3": "and",
      "location4": "Ho Chi Minh City",
      "location5": ", MoneyWise brings convenience in meeting, exchanging and consulting directly.",
      "consultingTitle": "CONSULTING AREAS AT MONEYWISE",
      "consulting1": "Personal & corporate investment consulting:",
      "consulting1Desc": "market analysis, investment opportunities, risk management.",
      "consulting2": "Corporate financial management consulting:",
      "consulting2Desc": "capital structure, cash flow, business expansion plan.",
      "consulting3": "Loan & credit consulting:",
      "consulting3Desc": "solutions to access capital, optimize borrowing costs.",
      "consulting4": "Insurance & retirement consulting:",
      "consulting4Desc": "asset protection plan, long-term safety assurance.",
      "consulting5": "Personal asset management consulting:",
      "consulting5Desc": "saving, investing and accumulating for the future.",
      "consulting6": "Tax & financial legal consulting:",
      "consulting6Desc": "regulatory compliance, legal cost optimization.",
      "coreValuesTitle": "CORE VALUES OF MONEYWISE",
      "coreValuesIntro": "Throughout its years of operation, MoneyWise has always taken the motto",
      "coreValuesMotto": "\"HEART - VISION - TALENT - TRUST\"",
      "coreValuesGuide": "as a guideline:",
      "value1": "HEART:",
      "value1Desc": "Responsibility, dedication, putting customer benefits first.",
      "value2": "VISION:",
      "value2Desc": "Aiming to become a multi-service financial consulting company.",
      "value3": "TALENT:",
      "value3Desc": "A team of experts with extensive knowledge & experience.",
      "value4": "TRUST:",
      "value4Desc": "Building prestige, becoming a reliable partner of customers."
    }
  },
  "community": {
    "title": "Welcome to the Community Page"
  },
  "footer": {
